title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New users can auto-claim licenses
description: By creating the Auto-claim policy for any product, IT Admins will enable eligible new users to claim a license to the product when they sign in. This removes the dependency on the IT Admin and provides a seamless experience to end users. Viva Goals will be onboarded to this platform. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.
